name: The Forecast
description:
You have made it to a remote forest outside of your home Town. For days its been a storm over the forest and not moving from the Forest. You decide its a good idea to go into the forest by your self, you set up camp near the exit, that way you will always know where your car and the exit is at.

This game is in Extreme early access its only $10.00 right now but upon full release it will jump up to $35.00, this game is made so i can fund another game that will start working on once i get the assets i need from the money i earn on this game and the game will be updated regularly.
